appShortName.description: The short-version name of the extension name

appDesc.message: Search and insert emojis in texts by typing ':'

fdbkCareToShare.message: Glad you like it! Can you help us share the ❤️?

reportAnIssue.description: Button text for reporting an issue

optionBlockedSitesDesc.message: Extension will not run on these sites. Enter one site per line.

optionHideRecentsDesc.message: Do not show the most recently used emojis upon invocation.

optionHideSuggestionsDesc.message: Do not show suggestions based on prior input upon invocation.

optionsEmojiColumnsDesc.message: The number of emojis to show per row.

optionEmojiRowsDesc.message: The number of emoji rows to show.
